verbose_text: The ability of metformin to suppress the expression of Oct4 and survivin XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR -two pivotal proteins driving the compartment of malignant stem cells responsible for teratocarcinoma growth- XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR and to circumvent the suppression of AMPK that allows iPS cells to avoid anabolic inhibition similarly to cancer cells XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR, can explain also the metformin 's ability to eliminate the compartment of malignant stem cells responsible for teratocarcinoma growth while safeguarding an intact competency to generate terminally differentiated tissues.
